title: Counting
text:
Given integersNandM, output in how many ways you can takeNdistinctpositive integers such that sum of those integers is ≤M. Since the result can be huge, output it modulo1000000007 (109+ 7)N ≤ 20M ≤ 100000InputFirst line of input is numbert, number of test cases. Each test case consists only of 2 numbers N and M, in that order.OutputOutput the answer asked for in the description.ExampleInput:4
6 16
4 16
1 14
3 7Output:0
27
14
2
